Description: Implement Simulink model of balancing robot nonlinear dynamics using 'chain of integrators' approach

Combine electromechanical, sensor, and driver models into full system

Validate LQR in simulation with initial tilt (5°) and position reference (10cm)

Test LQR on robot with 10cm position reference and 5V disturbance

(Optional) Implement PI yaw controller to prevent lateral drift
(Optional) Test combined longitudinal/yaw controller on robot
